content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were sitting out on their front porch, watching the stars. they live in the mountains so there is always a good view. initially when i spotted the object, i thought of it as a satellite, and pointed it out to my friends. but we then realized that it was travelling much too fast to be anything of that nature. it was white in color and moving quickly. it emitted a first flash and picked up speed, then after a few seconds another flash, and had disappeared completely from sight.
content.summary: Viewed an unidentified flying object that flashed once, then again, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: on august 18th 2011 at approximately 0434 am hours while on duty at my job, i gased up at the clear sky and observed a star like white obect that flewed from east to west with no sound at approximately comercial jet altitude. what it made me wonder if it was man made, is the fact that it was zigzaging while flying a path then as soon as it reached a 45degree angle on the east side of the sky, it acended and disapeared. i been a good portion of my life in the military and law enforcement and nothing on our u.S. arsenal could zigzag while flying the way this object performed. i am sure someone else had to see it too.
content.summary: Star like object zigzag path west heading east with no sound at 0434 hrs.

content.detailedDescription:
A little after midnight on friday night (aug. 12)/saturday morning, i went out to the beach with a relative to watch the perseids. shortly after we arrived, i looked up to our left and saw a light, that i initially thought was a star, moving slightly over the ocean. at first it seemed like one single yellowish white light, maybe a little brighter than most of the surrounding stars. i watched it for a while to see if it was a plane, but although it was definitely moving, it was neither coming nor going anywhere, just hovering and darting around within the same general space. then i noticed that besides the one constant yellow-white light, there were alternating other lights in red, green, and another pale color, maybe another set of white lights. there may have been other colors, but it was too dark to see, and blue would have been hard to pick out against the dark sky. the one, starlike yellow-white light was constantly on, although it did dim and get brighter. it might not be a correct one, but i got the impression from looking at it that all the lights were, in fact, attached to a single craft. they all stayed in the same position relative to each other even as it moved.

the best way i can describe the craft's movements is as hummingbird or bee-like, hovering and darting around, although not so fast that i couldn't trace its path. my relative saw it too and confirmed that there were definitely blinking lights and that it was moving strangely, totally unlike a plane and probably way too high up to be a helicopter. she then spotted another one to our right, also over the water, behaving almost identically, although it was farther away and harder to see, so i remained focused on the craft i initially spotted.

remembering several accounts i've heard of people being able to psychically communicate with craft, i silently asked that, if it could hear me, to indicate so by moving up and down. it did as i asked. then i asked for it to just move downwards this time, and it also complied. the third time i asked it to move side to side if it could hear me, and it started to do so before i could even finish the question in my head. a few minutes later i started asking those types of "give me proof that you can hear me" questions, but it stopped responding, and i got the distinct impression (again, just an impression) that it was fed up with that game.

we stayed there on the beach for about forty-five minutes, and both crafts remained for the entire time. they were there before we got there, and they were still there when we left, so i have no idea how long they were camped out over the atlantic. we discussed whether it could have been a weather balloon, but it was not moving like a weather balloon and that explanation doesn't count for the blinking multicolored lights and, well, last time i checked i couldn't psychically communicate with weather balloons. one last thing i should mention is that after my psychic communication, if that's really what it was, my whole skull felt warm, especially in the back. that was definitely a new sensation, and although i knew that logically i should be unnerved, i wasn't.
content.summary: Two craft that first appeared to be stars hovering over bethany beach during the perseids

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around my house . suddenly i saw a light in the sky . first i tought it was a plan but it was hovering . then i ignored it and went home . then i heard about this site and now i want to report it .
content.summary: It was very mysterios .

content.detailedDescription:
As a child, i kept telling my father that the stick people were hiding in my closet and like all fathers he laughed and said everything is ok...Over active mind etc... however, after he put me to bed, a short time later, i saw the stick people at the end of the bed. this time there were a lot of them four or five. they were very short with like a blue gray skin. at six years old they seemed ugle and i was afraid. as i lay there looking at them...I couldn't seem to yell out to my father to come see them, all i could do was watch...I couldn't move..The one that seemed to be in control moved very fast to the side of my bed next to me and raised a silver rod that glowed bringing it up to my nose or face. what happened after that i don't know because i passed out.
then in 1973-74 i was just about 18 living in rockford ill. it was some where after 10 pm i had just gotten into bed, when i hurd a light hum and a very bright light showed through the window of my room. i asked my sister what the bleep is this? she said i don't know. i said should we look? she said no and went slient...Again i couldn't move..I wanted to see it but i couldn't move. the hum it made was not like anything i've ever experanced before. the next day a friend of my mothers said she and a friend saw a ufo over our house.
in 1975 i moved back to burbank california. my husband and i were going to the store, as we came to the under pass a large silver shape disc appered in the sky,(we had just gone under the pass when i said to him) did you see that? he said no. i said hurry as i glued myself to the front window,as we came out from under the pass...The bottom of the ship mirrored us looking up at it, i could see us looking up at it...Then it changed to a night sky with stars, it was beautiful...As i was looking at it and as the stars faded i could see like...Well it was wird on the inside...Anyway as we continued on; it shimmered becomming transparent and seemed to be sucked out of the sky. it was not propelled like our airplanes...It was sucked out of the sky and gone. my question is, why didn't my husband see it...Why didn't everyone in burbank see it..This thing was as big as a foot ball feild. is it possable for one person to see them and others don't? do these things or beings have such an ability. i know what i saw and it was real, and nothing we have on earth could do what it did. years later a government program was showing pictures of ufo and i saw the one that i saw in 1975, i called to my husband, "see that's what i saw"..Happy that i could prove myself to him and then the gov man said none of these are real...Funny how something that is not real, is what i saw that day....How does that happen. how can they have a picture of what i saw and it's not real. 
how do i feel after seeing something like this? well, how would you feel if what you saw in day light not one other soul saw. how would you feel if everyone you knew thought you were crazy. how would you feel if these things have followed you for your whole life and how would you feel if you didn't understand what was happening to you. my father told me years later that he also had seen a long shape silver object as a boy in washington state where he grew up. it made me feel a bit better, but...Well what can i say this has been my experance with ufo.
content.summary: At six years of age i called them stick people. this night, five or six where at the foot of my bed and the first one moved very fast to the side of me in bed and raised a sliver rod that glowed up to my nose or face. i passed out.

content.detailedDescription: Someone took a picture of my football practice and a ufo is inthe picture plain as day.  the time time of day was between 5 and 5.15 pm on 8.8.2011  im going to go and find out who took this and why they gave it to me.  i want someone antilize this photo to make sure it is what im looking at.
content.summary: Someone took a pic of my practice and a ufo is in the pic

content.detailedDescription:
Approx. at 5:00 am, et, i saw, from my front-yard, 3 star-like objects in the dark sky move across the sky, from north toward east, with pulsating amber lights (more orange than red). they moved in a fairly straight path following one another with a distance in between. with my arm stretched, they were at a height of an index finger length above the roof-top of the neighbor's house (a few feet) across my street. the objects were silent, moved along very slowly, flying toward the east. after as few minutes of observing, i saw them moving much closer together, now looking like they formed a triangle for a few seconds, while hovering on the same spot. then they continued on toward the east. then i heard a helicopter noise, but didn't see one.

earlier, approx. 4:50 am, i also saw an orange ball in the sky from my back-yard, moving along silently, from north to east. i only saw it for a few seconds, after which it disappeared behind the buildings in the distance. this orange object was the same i have seen and reported on july 16, 2011, except it had no smaller lights below it. this time it was moving along fairly quickly.
content.summary: One orange ball, then 3 starlike, pulsating objects fly, hover, fly across sky

content.detailedDescription: looking out my parents window facing toward lake michigan in the east i saw this object. paid not much attention to it with the exception of the color.  it was the deepest red/orange color that i have ever seen in the nightsky.                                                                   went out side and watched it travel straight west toward my parents house way up in the sky.  the rather airplane like slow path of the object continued to go through the summer triangle of stars.  again like an airplane it slowly manuevered into a northern direction. i lost sight of it behind the trees.  the color of the object remained steady with no blinkinglights.                                                             this may have been a sattelite, but i have seen satelites and the iss.  the color is so different from those that i have observed and the time of visual was in a super long duration as to that of a satelite, flared or not. the object was slightly larger than venus.                                                                       i continued to watch the skies and about 15 minutes later saw in the original flight path 2  of what appeared to be white circular shaped puffs of smoke miles apart from each other in the sky. i would like to say that i have observed fuel dumps from satelites in the night sky. there is a distinct wavy dissapation and trail effect. again this was so much more different, the puffs stayed circular in shape looming slightly larger before they faded out.  i have scoured the internet for other obsevations unti this evening when a video appeared on a web site ufoglobalirc (u-tube, ufo caught in illinois on the aug.17th,2011)        i understand there are a lot of experimental planes in flight these days. this video evidence compelled me to report this incidence as something unusual.
content.summary: Watched the object not like a plane,helicopter or satellite

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were on our back porch in darrington facing north mountain about a half hour ago, and all of a sudden from behind a tree i saw a bright white object with green in the center fly by in a north east direction and i told my daughter to look. we both had time to stand up and turn around and watch it fall, to us it looked like it hit the earth somewhere in the mountain, it looked similar to a falling star, however it was green in the middle and it didn't just go out like a meteor, we actually saw it falling down all the way and the light didn't go out. we both actually waited to hear or see some type of explosion or feel something. then i thought i saw an airplane in the same area a few minutes after we saw the object.
content.summary: Bright falling object

content.detailedDescription: My wife had our dog out to do her business a little passed 2 a.M. (cst) i was in our kitchen when she threw the door open screaming for me,very shaken. i ran out in my shorts thinking someone was in our yard..She was trembling and told me she had witnessed a large triangular craft pass over our house. it was solid black triangle with seven soft, redish orange unwavering lights one at the tip and three down each side. there was no sound what so ever and appeared to be gliding very slow on a northwesterly heading. i was out the door in a matter of 3 to 5 seconds and this thing was gone that quick. i've been a member of mufon for quite sometime and have always told her when she's out at night always look up and tonight she found out first hand why. she was trembling and got sick to her stomach immediatley after witnessing this. our dog is very vigilant and never noticed a thing when this occured. i grabbed our camera and spent 30 minutes outside watching,hoping for a glimpse of this again but to no avail. her sighting was between 215-220 a.M.(cst)
content.summary: Had dog outside and when started back to house noticed large triangular shape craft with seven redish orange solid lights,no sound.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i  are currently sitting on the deck of my house and he noticed a weird object in the sky.  while i was inside he yelled come here,  i came outside and witnessed this myself.  i sat down on the chair facing the ne sky and at that time i had marked it thru the tree limbs, this object has changed shapes, moved directions, and is def something not of military experience.  once again i reiterate the fact that if anyone is near the great lakes to always look into the sky on a clear night.  it is still plain as day to us and lights up/  it is hard to explain other than it almost now looks like a butterfly lit up, by the way i live i findlay ohio.  this thing is odd it is not a star it is to low and i have tried to get a pic but cant.   this thing judging by the diff inaltitude is way closer thanany star would ever be.  amamazed i am that it is still hoverring. it seems to have taken a diff form almost scary..  this is not a joke at all, my friend is a farmer and he swears he has never in his life witnessed anything like this.  has anyone witnessed this?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Whatever this thing is it happened for the second time i am reporting, it seems to be in the ne sky which woukd be over columbus oh

content.detailedDescription: The same craft i observed on the 14th made same appearance. this time a bit more to the north but west nonetheless. object observed moving west to east then turning north somewhat before disappearing. moved slowly but at different speeds before moving towards the north and disappearing. same experience as before.
content.summary: Star like craft moving west to east northeast

content.detailedDescription: My girl and i were observing the sky when i witnessed a bright light zap into the sky from the south to the west. i then began to notice what i first thought was a star, start moving flying what seems to be shapes and writing into the sky. it will move at a speed that i know for a fact a jet can not accomplish in such a small amount of time and then turn nearly 90 and hover, as jets go by it, it will begin to hover and as soon as it gets parrel it zooms off and away from the jet. it was still in the sky to the west of my house looking to be above hamspire, tn. this was witnessed by my father, my mother, my fiance, her brother, and step brother, a neighbor, and myself. my father a strict church of christ christian who didn't believe me when i drug him outstide to see it even admitted himself while looking threw the telescope that it was no jet and that he didn't know what it was. he's in awe still. he thought maybe a sat, untill the object moved far to the north and then cut back what appeared to be straight up and then back south. it was still outside when i came in.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light and object fling what seems to be shapes or writing in sky.

content.detailedDescription: The star entered the "portal" in the southwest. it became brighter as it moved across the sky in an easterly fashion. it changed speeds as well as movement up and down. as it started to slow for a bit i noticed another craft, an airplane perhaps, with flashing light coming from the north toward us. at that moment the star light craft slowed, turned left and proceeded to go in a northerly direction towards the "plane". however it moved rapidly outwards and disappeared while the "airplane" with flashing lights continued on its southerly path.
content.summary: Bright star light cylinder craft moved sw to nw changed directions to north then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was leaning up against my car in a parking lot. two of my friends were facing me and another friend was sitting or leaning on my trunk facing about the same direction as me. i saw something out of the corner of my eye and looked in that direction. i observed a blue ball of light that appeared to be pretty small.(maybe between 5-10 feet diameter) then i notice that it was moving in a floating motion very slowly and instantly realized this was something highly out of the ordinary. i muttered ufo and pointed in the direction of what i was seeing to my friends. it was like the ball understood what i was doing and sped up very quickly and disappeared. it did not fly off, instead it appeared as if the ball had slipped into a hole or something. i knew my friends had turned around too lately. i was bummed they didn't see it because i knew they could not believe what i had just witnessed, but i still went on and told them anyways, with lots of excitement. then the friend who was sitting on my trunk (or leaning against it anyways) said he saw it. the whole event of my witnessing it couldn't have been anymore than a few seconds. we were in the parking lot of a church and the object was very close to the church. the ball couldn't have been more than 50-75 yards away from us, but made no noise whatsoever. about ten minutes later a helicopter flew over us and the church very lowly. it seemed like there were more planes flying in the area too. i had a very peaceful and spiritual type feeling when driving home that night. i talked with my one friend who said he saw the light too and he agreed it was something completely out of the ordinary. it's hard to put into words how this light appeared at the time of seeing it, it was like it didn't belong in this world. it wasn't like any other normal light i've seen before. i think my other two friends were convinced we saw something too.
content.summary: Saw blue hovering ball, called to friends, ball sped sped up quickly, disappeared into nothingness

content.detailedDescription: Witness was traveling on i-435 from raytown to olathe when she noticed three glowing objects appear from the western horizon.  these objects were shaped like "elongated jelly beans" and they were flying slowly over i-435 from west to east.  the witness was trying to pay attention to the objects and when the witness returned their attention to the highway there was a traffic jam on i-435.  the drivers in the 'traffic jam' were also paying attention to the 3 'elongated jelly bean' shaped objects flying over the highway.  at this moment the witness noticed that there were police vehicles from the local municipality who arrived at the scene of the 'traffic jam' with lights and sirens on, and the officers in those cars were also watching the objects flying over the highway.  the witness returned their attention to the 3 objects and according to the witness, the 3 'jelly bean' shaped objects increased in speed and disappeared over the eastern horizon.  this witness is extremely disturbed over the fact that there have been no reports in any of the local media outlets or newspapers.  the witness is very hesitant about coming forward with this event.  the witness wants to know if there have been any reports to any organizations concerning this event.  the witness contacted me via phone and this report was entered into the cms by stan seba, field investigator for mufon- i.D. # 17928.
content.summary: Three

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from doing my laundry, as i exited my truck i noticed a very bright light in the sky, i thought it was a star it was  in the north east sky above ishpeming michigan.I stared at it and it was stationary then i continue to stare in odd amazement due to its brightness.As i stared it started moving first in a straight line then it seemed to start changing direction then moving faster and faster due east until it faded out of site.What seemed strange is that i stared at the thing about  close to five minutes before it started moving.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Comming home from doing laundry, i observed a very bright light in the sky. i looked up thinking it was a star then it  started moving.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo does something spectacular on the 3rd day of watching.  it divides itself into 2 orbs, and at one point 3. forward to the 9:30 mark on the video if you do not want to watch the full video of the orb
content.summary: Day 3 of observing daytime ufo orbs

content.detailedDescription:
i stepped outside of work facing east at 2:00pm on 8-17-2011. i looked  towards the horizon line and saw a rectangular  metallic shape rotating end over end in the sky. i watched it move from the horizon line up into the sky. i went inside and called my co-workers & bosses to come see it. 
	when we went outside it had moved farther into the sky, but you could still make out the shape and that it was rotating. 6 people, including myself, watched it move farther away towards the upper atmosphere in a northwardly direction.  the total amount of time the object was visible was 7-8 minutes.
	i felt excited that i got to see it, i only wish i had a camera. i���m glad that i got other people to witness it.
content.summary: Rotating rectangular metallic object sighted by 6 witnesses in daytime.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 14 years old my family and i lived in nc just outside willmington,near rockypoint we camehome late one night in june around midnight we had a couple of horses so i went to check on them and feed them. i was at the barn about 30.In as i walked back towards the house i noticed some lights approaching! they appeared to be landing lights like on an airplane, but i had never seen any aircraft approach from that direction before. i thought that was odd so i stopped about 30 feet from the house and watched as the craft approached as it grew near it got larger and larger until i could tell it was no ordinary aircraft as it made no noise at all. as it came closer i could see details and i realized this was no plane or jet of any known types of the times. the craft came within a quarter mile of me and stopped in mid air hovering in place quietly. the craft was so large i could see it very clear
i could see windows here and there as some were lit from within
it looked like something straight out of star wars. it was approximately 250 ft from nose to tail,  500 ft wide, about 30ft thick at wingtips and the nose
but at center rear it was maybe 100 ft thick on each rear of each wing it had three large rectangular shaped protrusions that glowed red. i figured that must be exhaust ports
maybe fusion powered. the red rectangles looked to be about the size of a single mobile home, and as i said it made no noise at all. i observed the craft for maybe 4 or 5mins then it turned as if you grabbed a pole and swung around. at which time it headed away from me just as quietly as it had came and in the direction from which it came. now the approach was n,nw to s,sw.Now where we were was about 17 miles from the air port at willmington.I have always wonderd if any one else ever reported this or saw it aswell? i can't think of much else to say at the moment but i remember the incident well i can still see it in my mind clearly to this day i will never forget that night ever.My only regret is that we had no camera to get a picture i asked my mother for one she asked why i wanted it and i told her never mind you wouldn't believe me any way fearing she would freak and make me come in the house. not wanting to miss the sighting i didn't tell my parents what i was looking at until it was gone.I am sorry i didn't report this then but i'm sure you understand. i know what i saw.I can rough draw it too show what it looked like.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large chevron or wing shaped object about 500 feet across and 250 feet long approximately  500 feet above ground with 3 large red rectangular engine ports on each side of rear.

content.detailedDescription:
I came outside to smoke a cigarette and immediately spotted elongated ovals that were of a warm color and feel.

they were far apart and very close over buildings and seemed extremely large. as i walked they followed while ascending. there was absolute silence. the continued to ascend to a great hight and began to get smaller (probably due to elevation.)

they moved closer together in a very uniform fashion. at this point they very very close, but exercised great control.

then the one on the right just disappeared shortly after the other disappeared over the ocdean
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Orange orbs of l.A

content.detailedDescription: I live alone in a single family house in a suburb near a large city. i awoke at 2:35 a.M. (pst) on wednesday, august 17, 2011; left my bedroom (which is a guest room since the temperature in the summer is cooler than the master bedroom); walked down the dark hallway (faintly illuminated by glow of bug zapper down hall used for killing moths from bird seed); entered master bedroom; shut the door behind me (except for a crack); and i could see motion in the dark hallway that looked as if someone walked up to the door and was peering at me. afraid to face the possibility someone was in the house, and knowing the house was bolted down like a fortress (with deadbolts, "hotel bolts," and shatter-resistant multi-pane windows), i used the restroom without turning on the lights. i then cautiously entered the hall and nobody was there, but down the hall, a bright fuzzy white light shined through cracks in locked room. i thought to myself, could it be the bright white energy saving front porch light that has over 100 watts of output? however, as i stared at the illumination surrounding the door and emitting through its threshold, it quickly faded out, leaving the faint illumination from the porch light as i then recalled was always the case. (the mating of the door and threshold was so tight even the bright white light coming through the threshold was non-existent except in a few places, and the light that did get through was faint.) i immediately realized someone was in that room, shining a bright light that must have been an led or hid light due to its intensity. after pausing for a moment to think, i decided to quickly throw open the door and face whoever was there. when i did, the room was empty. i recall getting waves of goose bumps all over my body because i knew something unexplainable had occurred. whoever was in the hallway was the one who disappeared in that room, i was certain of it. as a little history, my family and i have had ufo visitations my entire life, with unusual activity in the homes where i grew up (i.E. time distortions with clocks off in every room, objects hurling across a room for no apparent cause, and other inexplicable phenomenon beyond the scope of this report). in the mid-1990's in my parents��� home i awoke to see a young man in his 20's wearing military fatigues and a helmet standing at the foot of my bed staring at me. at the blink of an eye he was gone. for some strange reason, my immediate thought when this event occurred was that man was in my hallway, although i cannot explain why i sensed it was him again. as a side note i felt in no danger. my imagination ran wild for a moment in speculating who it was or why they were in my house and how they disappeared; was it a time traveler? an e.T.? i'm afraid if they return and i open the door before they disappear into that white light, what will happen if i confront them? these are my observations to the best of my recollection.
content.summary: Human-like entity (approximately 6' height) in dark hallway, followed by unnaturally bright light in next room illuminating through door threshold for a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on hwy 72 in between ward, co and nederland, co. at about 11:15 pm. on august 11th, 2011.  i noticed light outside vehicle, and thought it was either reflection from sunglasses hanging from rearview mirror, or nearly full moon light through the trees.  as i continued driving, the lights stayed with me.  it seemed to be in pieces that were rotating around me.  it became clear that the source of the light was real but nothing i could explain.  i felt a surge of fear.  i looked in the mirrors, and out the windows, but could see nothing.  i couldn't see above me, but it seemed that the lights were coming from above the vehicle.  finally, i turned my head around to look directly out the back window.  i saw a bright neon green ball of light.  it seemed to be a couple hundred yards behind me, but i can not be sure.  i turned my attention back to the road; a car passed.  when i turned back around the light was gone.   i thought that perhaps someone was harassing the vehicle with a green lazar light. the following day, i checked with the local pd, and there were no reports of anything similar to my experience.  the most impressive part of this incredible experience was the sense of fear i felt, which i can not explain any more than the lights i saw.
content.summary: Swirling bluish lights followed vehicle for a couple miles; saw green light behind vehicle

content.detailedDescription: Myself and other members of national guard witnessed a light traving from south to north at the greenlief training site, just before the light got near the barracks it did a course change and moved away from us heading north east. this object was below 36,ooo feet as myself and several others watch a airliner fly over the object. if object was a airplane or helo we would have heard engine noise but there wasnt any sound from the object.
content.summary: Light over army training site in nebraska.

content.detailedDescription: Must talk to you on phone about information
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I went under ufo which has magnetic feild which is about 14 inchs wide

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed it when i was driving away from my house.  it was so bright i couldn't take my eye off of it. it proceeded to get brighter so i pulled off to the side of the road to watch it. i then noticed it got really bright like a ball of fire then proceeded to ascend slowly. one it stop ascending the ball of fire turned into a diamond shaped craft and proceeded to fly forward. while flying forward it seemed to dip quickly as if it was dodging somethin an very slowly then continued in a straight path right over my head. it had green white and orange lights rotating throughout the diamond shape. once it reached, which seemed like the city limits, it flew very fast till i could no longer see it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering bright orb w/ slow ascention then quick acceleration

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were visiting our grandkids down the street. i had bought a new camcorder and i placed it on a tripod to get steady film of the moon. i wanted to see how much the camera would zoom in on the moon. we noticed the light ascending towards the moon. it reached its highest point then looked like it was falling towards the earth. noe of this could be seen with the naked eye.
content.summary: My wife and i were filming the moon with our new camera when we saw this.

content.detailedDescription: These lights happen often. military jets as many as five circle the sky way high above the (lights)  during these events, when we hear the jets rumbling we know to start watching for the strange lights. these strange lights will make the hair stand up on the back of your neck and give you the chills. obseerved at times from 2/11/2011 eight thirty pm and as late as 7/28/2011  ten thirty pm.    many ranchers in zavala county, east of crystal city texas have seen these very strange lights that can change from being a single to a triangle to a rectangle to the shape of a vertical bar. the lights can stay on for minutes at a time, to on and off quickly. these events can last at times well over 30 minutes. when the event is over the jets go away. the lights are usually in the south west direction and about a ten oclock high degree. also are reports of disruption of gps instruments.You will know it when you see them.
content.summary: Shape of a triangle with a yellow- white light at each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home from work around 11:45 p.M. on saturday, august 13, 2011. as i walked toward my house from my detached garage, i looked up and noticed a meteor streaking brightly across the northwest part of the horizon. i decided to grab my digital camera and tripod and went back outside to take some timed exposures to see if i could capture a meteor or two. my exposures ranged 6 and 8 seconds and the camera was aimed toward the northwest, angled about 45 degrees above the horizon. i made several exposures and then rotated the camera more directly upward closer to 90 degrees above the horizon. the photos were taken from about 12:20 a.M. until around 12:45 a.M. sunday, august 14, 2011, from my driveway in the east san jose foothills. the camera was mounted to a small tripod to avoid shaking. while i observed many meteors with my eyes, i did not see anything unusual in the sky. that is until i reviewed the photos later sunday morning about 9 a.M. i was astonished to see the object shown in the photos i have submitted. i didn't hear any aircraft or other noises, nor did i observe any unusual lights or objects in the sky while i was photographing meteors. i am convinced that this a craft of non-terestrial origin, and that it was hovering in different positions in the sky near my home. i have no idea what it is. i will be attempting to capture further images of this object, hopefully a little clearer.
content.summary: Trying to photo meteors, subsequent review of photos showed object in photos that was not observed when taking the photos.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on the porch when we noticed an orange light appear over the george airforce base, adelanto.  the light then winked out. a few minutes later 2 lights appeared for a few seconds and then winked out. shortly thereafter, 3 lights appeared and then disappeared.  the 3 lights then reappeared and we noticed all the lights at the airbase switch on and a helicopter take off toward the lights.  as the helicopter approached, the lights winked out and the helicopter returned to the base.  the lights returned and another 2 lights appeared a short distance to the left of the original 3.  an aircraft then took off from the airbase and headed toward the lights.  the lights again disappeared as the aircraft approached.  we watched the aircraft fly around the area and then noticed the lights appear over the other side of the airbase which could be several miles from where they first appeared.  the period of time was about 10 to 15 minutes from when they disappeared to when the reappeared a few miles away.  the aircraft turned and headed towards the 3 lights.  the 3 lights then all of a sudden became 6 and were in a z formation with 1 light on the left, 4 in a diagonal line and 1 on the bottom right.  they kept this formation for about 5 minutes and then disappeared as the aircraft approached.  when the aircraft had gone passed, the lights appeared again in a triangle formation with 6 or more lights. they kept this formation for approximately another 5 minutes. some of the lights were fading in and out.  the aircraft returned to the area and the lights again disappeared.  once the aircraft had gone passed again, the lights appeared in a pentagon shape and stayed that way for about 5 minutes.  another helicopter arrived in the area as did another plane.  the lights then disappeared.  the aircraft continued to fly around the area and the lights would re appear once the aircraft had gone passed.  at one stage one of the lights left the group and followed the plane for a short distance, then returned and they disappeared again.

we continued to watch as aircraft kept flying around the area but the lights did not return.  the whole event happened over a period of about an hour.

unfortunately we had no video camera as we had just moved house, the cameras were still in boxes and in need of recharging.
content.summary: Orange/red lights moving over george airforce base
